text: Thomas Hart Benton may refer to: * Thomas Hart Benton (politician) (1782–1858), Missouri politician, father of Jesse Benton Fremont, and great- uncle of the painter of the same name ** Thomas Hart Benton (Doyle), a marble sculpture by Alexander Doyle * Thomas Hart Benton (painter) (1889–1975), American populist muralist * Thomas Hart Benton (film), a 1988 documentary film about the painter ==See also== * Thomas Hart (disambiguation) * Thomas Benton (disambiguation) Benton, Thomas Hart
title: Thomas Hart Benton
